value.title: Data Society launches AI-driven meldR platform for data science training
value.excerpt: Data Society has announced the launch of meldR, a social learning platform that allows L&D teams to deliver AI-generated data science learning courses.

value.title: Amnesty International concerned over facial recognition, CCTV surveillance in Hyd.
value.excerpt: Hyderabad, by means of its CCTV network and facial recognition technology, is one of the most surveilled cities in the world, and extensive surveillance here is putting human rights at risk, Amnesty International said in a statement.

value.title: Honesty and ethics not well explained by managers in New Zealand
value.excerpt: The majority of employees in New Zealand are confident their organizations are honest and there is no misconduct at work, but their line managers don't always explain the importance of honesty and ethics in the work they are leading.

value.title: Enterprise process automation startup Workato nabs $200M
value.excerpt: Workato, a workplace automation tool, has raised $200 million in venture capital to expand its set of enterprise offerings.

value.title: Self-driving truck startup Kodiak Robotics raises $125M
value.excerpt: Kodiak Robotics, one of the last privately held autonomous truck outfits in Silicon Valley, has raised $125 million in new capital, funding that will be used to double its workforce as it pursues a path to commercialization.

value.title: Luminar Lidar to Integrate with NVIDIA DRIVE Hyperion AI Platform; Shares Jump
value.excerpt: Luminar Technologies (LAZR), the global automotive lidar hardware and software technology provider, announced that its lidar solution has been selected to integrate into the sensor suite of semiconductor maker Nvidia Corporation’s (NVDA) AI vehicle computing platform for autonomous vehicles.

value.title: New AI Model Uses NLP To Analyze African Languages

value.title: Li Ka-Shing-Backed AI Startup Founder Targets Electric Vehicles, Growth Amid Global Chip Shortage

value.title: ML observability platform WhyLabs raises $10M to monitor models and data in production

value.title: Inworld AI joins metaverse innovation with AI-driven virtual characters
